sourcesContent:
import {categories, Category} from './categories'
export interface Product {
  id: number;
  name: string;
  price: number;
  description: string;
  rating: number;
  image: string;
  addressUrl: string;
  link: string;
  category: Category;
  likes: number;
}

export const products = [
  {
    id: 1,
